description.value: With unparalleled focus, you can tap into and sift through the memories of every contemplative who has come before. You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Collective Memories] ritual once per week as the primary caster. When you do so, you can ignore the rare incense cost; if you do so, you become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} after completing the ritual.
